name: CP-2
description: Guide the user through the development and documentation of a comprehensive system contingency plan, including essential mission functions, recovery objectives, restoration priorities, roles, and responsibilities.

lessons_learned.description: Incorporating lessons learned from testing, training, or actual contingency activities into the contingency plan.

frequency_review.description: The frequency at which the contingency plan will be reviewed and updated.

contingency_roles.description: Roles and responsibilities of individuals involved in the contingency plan, along with their contact information.

mission_functions.description: The essential mission and business functions that need to be maintained during a disruption.

approval_personnel.description: The organization-defined personnel or roles responsible for reviewing and approving the plan.

system_restoration.description: How the system will be fully restored without deteriorating the originally implemented controls.

contingency_updates.description: How changes in the organization, system, or environment will be incorporated into the plan.

recovery_objectives.description: The recovery objectives, restoration priorities, and metrics for system restoration.

key_contingency_personnel.description: Personnel or organizational elements responsible for contingency roles (identified by name or role).

unauthorized_access_protection.description: Measures to protect the contingency plan from unauthorized disclosure or modification.

contingency_information_sharing.description: How contingency plan information will be shared across relevant personnel.
